short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply search addresses to get homeowner information. Great for Realtors, Roofers, Handy Men, and Insurance Agents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Users of Kanvas can navigate to their favorite prospecting websites and "Knock" on the home. Once "Knocked" the prospect's information shows up on your screen. Kanvas an entire neighborhood straight from your favorite computer chair. 
Happy Kanvasing!
